ethumage pradhanathwayen dewala nilamewarunda, pariwara nilamewarunda, piriwaragena mema randoli perahara me masa 19 wanadina rathri sita withi sancharaya karanu atha.athigaru janadhipathithuma, shri lanka parlimenthuwe kathanayaka chamal rajapaksha mathithuma, aarthika sanwardhana amathya basil rajapaksha mathithuma, uuwa palath pradhana amathya shashindra rajapaksha mathithuma, hambanthota disthrik parlimenthu manthri namal rajapaksha mathithuma saha aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mathithuma yana sambhawaniya amuththan mema awasthawata sahabhagi wimata niyamithaya.pura dina 07 k pawathwena mema kala mangalyaya sandaha wishesha aarakshaka wadapiliwalakda kriyathmaka we.

mahawilachchiya waw ha wari paddhathiya abalanwa thibiyadi 1955 - 1957 wasara waladi ewakata pawathi rajaya wisin prathisanskaranaya kota gowi pawul padinchi karawamin mahawilachchiya gowi janapada wyaparaya arambaana ladi.ada wana wita hathalis awuruddakin prathisanskaranaya kara nathi kadi bindi giya wari paddhathi haraha thama kumbauruwalata jalaya laba gatha nohakiwa gowihu antha asarana wi sitithi.
